Key Match Events: Belgium lost 0-1 to Slovakia with goals from Schranz (7') and Schranz (41')
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium were on a 17-match streak heading into the fixture
Belgium were the clear favourites to prevail from a group that also featured Romania and Ukraine
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belgium currently on a 44-year streak of not drawing a European Championship match
This was the first competitive fixture between Belgium and Slovakia
